com.tmb.reports

Class ExtentLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tmb.reports.ExtentLogger

  • public final class ExtentLogger
extends java.lang.Object
    Used for logging the events in the extent report.

    Encapsulates the unnecessary methods from users Jan 21, 2021

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Amuthan Sakthivel
    See Also:
    ExtentReport, ExtentManager
